lines.english:
When things get way too much
Get way too much
lines.irish:
Nuair a éiríonn rudaí iomarca ar fad
Iomarca ar fad

lines.english: Nuair a éirím ó mo leabaidh tá mé gléasta
lines.irish: When I get up from my bed I'm dressed

lines.english: Réidh fá choinne cibé rud 'tá I gceist le
lines.irish: Ready for whatever lies ahead

lines.english: I bhfad rómhinic mhúscail mise is mé céasta
lines.irish: Too often I used to wake up tormented

lines.english: Ach anois osclaím mo shúil is tá mé réidh fá choinne aon rud
lines.irish: But now I open my eyes and I'm ready for anything

lines.english: Live, laugh, love
lines.irish: Mair, gáir, grá

lines.english: Used to feel nothin' till I took some drugs
lines.irish: Níor mhothaigh mé tada go dtí gur ghlac mé drugaí

lines.english: Now I run about just feelin' pure smug
lines.irish: Anois siúlaim thart ag mothú go hiomlán sástáilte

lines.english: Cos I made it out the ruts
lines.irish: Mar d’éalaigh mé as an ngéarghátar

lines.english: Not to say I feel good, but I feel nasc more than I ever could
lines.irish: Nílim ag rá go bhfuil mé go hiontach, ach mothaím ceangal níos mó ná riamh

lines.english: Achan uile rud ag bogadh róghasta
lines.irish: Everything is moving too fast

lines.english: So tógaim céim siar whenever I haveta
lines.irish: So I take a step back whenever I have to

lines.english: Started to substitute stress out for laughter
lines.irish: Thosaigh mé ag cur gáire in áit struis

lines.english: Get myself in check, relax and come back after
lines.irish: Ceartaím mé féin, ligim scíth agus tagaim ar ais ina dhiaidh

lines.english: Furasta bheith faoi smacht ag freagracht
lines.irish: Easy to be controlled by responsibility

lines.english: Snowed under when you've stuff ya can't clock
lines.irish: Faoi bhrú nuair nach féidir leat an méid atá agat a láimhseáil

lines.english: The show must go on, some things ya can't stop
lines.irish: Caithfidh an seó leanúint ar aghaidh, tá rudaí nach féidir leat stopadh

lines.english: Scaifte anseo le tú a fheiceáil, make them laugh, pal
lines.irish: Tá an slua anseo le tú a fheiceáil, déan iad a chur ag gáire, a chara

lines.english:
When things get way too much
You gotta give me a touch, one, two
lines.irish:
Nuair a éiríonn rudaí iomarca
Caithfidh tú teagmháil a thabhairt dom, haon, dó

lines.english: Just know it'll never be enough
lines.irish: Bí ar an eolas nach mbeidh sé riamh go leor

lines.english:
Gotta get out your head, boy
Before you know it you'll be dead, gone
lines.irish:
Caithfidh tú dul amach as do cheann, a bhuachaill
Sula dtuigeann tú, beidh tú marbh, imithe

lines.english: But I can't keep you off my mind
lines.irish: Ach ní féidir liom tú a bhaint de m'intinn

lines.english: Bíonn laethanta mar sin againn ar fad
lines.irish: We all have days like that

lines.english: Rud I ndiaidh ruda, chin up, brother, it's grand
lines.irish: Thing after thing, chin up, a bhráthair, tá sé ceart go leor

lines.english: When it seems that it's comin' gan stad
lines.irish: Nuair a bhreathnaíonn sé go bhfuil sé ag teacht gan stad

lines.english: Puff your chest out, lad, and remember who's the man
lines.irish: Sín amach do bhrollach, a fhear, agus cuimhnigh cé hé an ceannaire

lines.english: Roinnt amanntaí agaigh chróga
lines.irish: Sometimes you have to face things bravely

lines.english: Réiteach eile, tá sé go breá a bheith brónach
lines.irish: Another approach: it's okay to be sad

lines.english: Take the olive branch, I'm sure you know that
lines.irish: Glac leis an craobh olóige, táim cinnte go dtuigeann tú é sin

lines.english: Just get through this mornin', bain triail arís tráthnóna
lines.irish: Níl ort ach éalú tríd an mhaidin, bain triail eile as tráthnóna

lines.english: Seachas féin-chrá, cad é faoi fhéin-ghrá
lines.irish: Instead of self-torment, what about self-love

lines.english: Seachas bheith ag tabhairt amach duit féin gach lá
lines.irish: Instead of giving out to yourself every day

lines.english: Glac sos lig scíth, goid píos ó do chíste
lines.irish: Take a break, rest, steal a piece of your own cake

lines.english: Luigh sa leabaidh níl muid anseo ach fá choinne píosa
lines.irish: Lie in the bed, we’re only here for a bit

lines.english: Is beag lá nach bhfuil tú ar m'intinn
lines.irish: There are few days when you're not on my mind

lines.english: Is beag comhrá nach bhfaigheann tusa mention
lines.irish: Few conversations go by without you being mentioned

lines.english: Faraor géar ní fhaighimid extension
lines.irish: Sadly we don’t get an extension

lines.english: So take your time with the shit you be ingestin'
lines.irish: Mar sin glac do chuid ama leis an truflais atá tú ag glacadh isteach

lines.english:
So fill your cup
And don't be lettin' no cunt take away your buzz with every single sup
lines.irish:
Mar sin líon do chupán
Agus ná lig d’aon amadán do shonas a ghoid le gach sip amháin

lines.english:
Cos that's the way it is
Doesn't mean it always was
lines.irish:
Sin mar atá sé
Ní chiallaíonn sé go raibh sé mar sin i gcónaí

lines.english: But I'm grateful to fuck for these class A drugs
lines.irish: Ach táim buíoch as na drugaí Rang A seo, le do thoil

lines.english:
When things get way too much
You gotta give me a touch, one, two
Just know it'll never be enough
lines.irish:
Nuair a bhíonn rudaí iomarca
Tabhair dom teagmháil, haon, dó
Bí ar an eolas nach mbeidh sé riamh sách maith

lines.english:
Gotta get out your head, boy
Before you know it you'll be dead and gone
But I can't keep you off my mind
lines.irish:
Caithfidh tú éalú as do cheann, a bhuachaill
Sula dtuigeann tú, beidh tú marbh agus imithe
Ach ní féidir liom tú a bhaint de m’intinn
